verses.verse: For the Chief Musician; set to Jonath elem rehokim. A Psalm of David. Michtam; when the Philistines took him in Gath. Be mercifu <WH2603> unto me <WH430>, O God; For man <WH582> would swallow me up <WH7602>: All the day <WH3117> long he fighting <WH3898> oppresseth me <WH3905>.
Mine enemies <WH8324> would swallow <WH7602> me up all the day <WH3117> long <WH4791>; For they are many <WH7227> that fight proudly against me <WH3898>.
What time <WH3117> I am afraid <WH3372>, I will put my trust in thee <WH982>.
In God <WH430> (I will praise <WH1984> his word <WH1697>), In God <WH430> have I put my trust <WH982>, I will not be afraid <WH3372>; What can flesh <WH1320> do unto me <WH6213>?
All the day <WH3117> long they wrest <WH6087> my words <WH1697>: All their thoughts <WH4284> are against me for evil <WH7451>.
They gather themselves together <WH1481>, they hide <WH6845> themselves <WH8104>, They mark my steps <WH6119>, Even as they have waited <WH6960> for my soul <WH5315>.
Shall they escape <WH6405> by iniquity <WH205>? In anger <WH639> cast down <WH3381> the peoples <WH5971>, O God <WH430>.
Thou numberest <WH5608> my wanderings <WH5112>: Put <WH7760> thou my tears <WH1832> into thy bottle <WH4997>; Are they not in thy book <WH5612>?
Then shall mine enemies <WH341> turn <WH7725> back <WH268> in the day <WH3117> that I call <WH7121>: This I know <WH3045>, that God is for me <WH430>.
In God <WH430> (I will praise <WH1984> his word <WH1697>), In Jehovah <WH3068> (I will praise <WH1984> his word <WH1697>),
In God <WH430> have I put my trust <WH982>, I will not be afraid <WH3372>; What can man <WH120> do unto me <WH6213>?
Thy vows <WH5088> are upon me <WH430>, O God: I will render <WH7999> thank-offerings <WH8426> unto thee.

For thou hast delivered <WH5337> my soul <WH5315> from death <WH4194>: Hast thou not delivered my feet <WH7272> from falling <WH1762>, That I may walk <WH1980> before <WH6440> God <WH430> In the light <WH216> of the living <WH2416>?
